div.p: A MACHINE TO SOMEBODY WHO DOES YOU A KINDNESS.
SUMMER ALMOST HERE, THE URCHINS ALMOST OUT OF SCHOOL AND YOU CAN
COUNT ON THEM DOING DOPEY THINGS THAT ANOW YOU.
MAKE THEM READ REAL BOOKS, HERE IS THE ONE OF THE BEST, LAST
DAYS OF JESUS. ONCE THE KID STARTS THIS BOOK,
THEY WILL FINISH IT AND THAT WILL KEEP THEM AWAY FROM THE
DO THE KIDS A FAVOR, PUT THE "LAST DAYS OF JESUS" IN THEIR
HANDS THIS SUMMER. FACTOR TIP OF THE DAY.
THAT IS IT FOR US TONIGHT. CHECK OUT THE WEBSITE DIFFERENT
FROM BILLOREILLY.COM AND SPOUT OFF ABOUT THE FACTOR.
